channel.title: curl on A Potpourri of Data Science Topics for Analysts
channel.description: Recent content in curl on A Potpourri of Data Science Topics for Analysts

item.title: Intro into APIs: How to access data from public REST APIs with `curl`
item.description: This post will be about understanding how REST APIs work and how you can use them to get interesting datasets for your data projects. GraphQL and creating an API on your own will be subject to another blogpost.
